whitebalancemodes: Automatic, Fine, Shade, Fluorescent light (Daylight), Fluorescent light (Warm White), Fluorescent light (Cool White), Incandescent light, Underwater, Custom, Colour temperature selection
flashmodes: Auto Auto/Red-eye Reduction Flash On w/ Red-eye Reduction Forced On Off Slow Sync Slow Sync./Red-eye Reduction
exposuremodes: Programmed AE, Shutter priority AE, Aperture priority AE, Manual exposure

focusrange: Normal:  50cm (1.6 ft.) to infinity; Macro: 10cm - 2.0m (3.9 in.- 6.6 ft.)
